ygData.subject: Re: Pottery?? The unknown art form, hehe
ygData.msgSnippet: Please tell... What do you mean by this?  It seems you are saying that Enchanters frequent HighPass?  Beginning at level 8?  Why in the world would a level 8
ygData.messageBody:
Please tell... What do you mean by this? It seems you are saying that
Enchanters frequent HighPass? Beginning at level 8? Why in the world would
a level 8 character of ANY type want to frequent HighPass? Is this "an
enchanter thing?"

Travis



Or unless your an enchanter in which case you frequent highpass hold
(starting at level 8ish) and have already checked out all this stuff and
spent alot of time playing unsucessfully. =)

Shads

On Fri, 30 Apr 1999, TRAVISL wrote:

> From: TRAVISL <TRAVIS@...>
>
> It seems to me that a lot of things are only to be found in HighPass.....
> And since that is such a darn terrible place... of course that means this
is
> by design. We aren't intended to know these things until we can safely
> travel that zone.
>
> Travis
